com.paydiant.android.core.util.rest.client

Class ServerMaintenanceModeErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.client.DefaultResponseErrorHandler
      • com.paydiant.android.core.util.rest.client.EntityResponseErrorHandler
        • com.paydiant.android.core.util.rest.client.ServerMaintenanceModeErrorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.client.ResponseErrorHandler

    public class ServerMaintenanceModeErrorHandler
extends EntityResponseErrorHandler
    Custom REST error handler to support Mobile Gateway Maintenance Mode status codes. This error handler will generate the PaydiantServerMaintenaceModeException exception for maintenance mode status code.
    Author:
    Paydiant
